sentences.sentence: He voiced his solidarity with the weak and defenseless.
sentences.translation: 他表示自己站在弱势无助群体一边。

sentences.sentence: Cases such as this demonstrate that even diseases that are not normally fatal can have devastating consequences when they strike an immunologically defenseless community.
sentences.translation: 这样的案例表明，即使是通常不致命的疾病，当它们袭击一个免疫防御能力不强的社区时，也会造成毁灭性的后果。

sentences.sentence: What your association is backing is a program which would allow the middle and upper classes to acquire a bomb while poor people will be left defenseless with just handguns.
sentences.translation: 你的协会所支持的的项目，允许中上层阶级持有炸弹，而穷人除了手枪则手无寸铁。
